How to Install Sphinx on projects

  1. Install wsl onto your pc in order to run linux commands in powershell

Note

Enter wsl –install

  1. Ensure Linux Distro is present after install of wsl. * Default distro is Ubuntu 22.04 * You can change to the Distro of your choice

  2. Start wsl in powershell

Note

Enter wsl

  1. Install Sphinx

Note

Enter apt-get install sphinx

  1. Check version of Python

Note

Enter python - -version

  1. Install pip

Note

Enter apt-get install pip

  1. Ensure pip is installed

Note

Enter pip -V
